QuestData.Title: Sunsworn Camp
QuestData.Description: We no longer have a need to work alongside the Auchenai, champion. I have arranged for their lead soulbinders to continue to advise us, but I believe any action is best left to us at this point.$B$BMeet me at Sunsworn Camp, southeast of here. I can sense more demonic taint in the area, and we may be able to track down the remaining power crystal shards at its source.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lady Liadrin at Sunsworn Camp in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: There is still much to be done before we can leave Auchindoun with peace of mind, champion.
